comments:
Using 0806, I cannot restart my workspace.
I get:

Simply replacing swt with version from integration build 0730 doesn't fix the 
problem. I used the integration build 0730 for a while without a problem. So 
the problem should not be only in SWT.

i had the same problem this morning - also with other eclipse versions

and i noticed that dnd stopped working in the whole Windows OS 
(and clipboard operations)

i suspect the W32.Blaster.Worm to have sth to do with it. i removed it and the 
dnd problem is gone.

Confirmed. It works again.
Don't know exactly what happened.
Can close as INVALID.

I just talked to Jin Li on the usability team, who said that his machine had 
been infected by W32.Blaster.Worm, and his clipboard operations stopped 
working at that time.  However, I couldn't find any mention about impact to 
the clipboard in the description of the worm by Symantec.
